about_the_game:
The Euro Fishing Season Pass saves money and grants access to the next 4 lake add-ons upon their release.

Each venue will be unique in its own right with a stunning setting, new boss fish, more achievements, and great angling experiences.

Begin with the licensed Manor Farm Lake on the Linear Fisheries complex in Oxfordshire, well known for its hard fighting Carp. Then with three more add-ons included in this Season Pass, you can be certain you will need all of your skills, knowledge and equipment to master the new venues and their new challenges.

With two lakes releasing in 2017 and a further two more in early 2018 you will be hooked for months to come!

  • Lake 1 – Manor Farm Lake
  • Lake 2 – Le Lac d'or
  • Lake 3 – Waldsee
  • Lake 4 – Bergsee

Four fantastic venues, one great price! Requires Euro Fishing core game, sold separately.

With two lakes releasing in 2017 and a further two more in early 2018 you will be hooked for months to come!

name: Euro Fishing: Season Pass

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bit / 8 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 1 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 460 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64bit / 8 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-Core 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics Card with 2 GB Video RAM: Nvidia Geforce GTX 660 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: External mouse or compatible Xbox controller required

short_description: The Euro Fishing Season Pass saves money and grants access to the next 4 lake add-ons upon their release. Each venue will be unique in its own right, beginning with the licensed Manor Farm Lake that is out now. This is followed by the next venue in 2017 and a further two more in early 2018 - you will be hooked for months to come!
